rikaaa.org

<rikaaa-tab>

The Custom Element in order to impliment simple tab function.

Installation

script

<!-- If you want to use the Custom Element with browser without not support Webcomponents.-->
<script src="https://unpkg.com/@webcomponents/webcomponentsjs@2.2.10/webcomponents-loader.js"></script>

<script src="rikaaa-tab.js"></script>

Usage

HTML

<rikaaa-tab>
    <button slot="tab">button1</button> <!-- elective. "slot="tab" is required. -->
    <button slot="tab">button2</button> <!-- elective. "slot="tab" is required. -->
    <button slot="tab">button3</button> <!-- elective. "slot="tab" is required. -->
    <div slot="bar"><span class="bar">seek bar</span></div> <!-- elective. "slot="bar" & class="bar" is required. -->
    <section>panel 1:write in your contents 1</section> <!-- required -->
    <section>panel 2:write in your contents 2</section> <!-- required -->
    <section>panel 3:write in your contents 3</section> <!-- required -->
</rikaaa-tab>

Attribute

<rikaaa-tab seekbarh="3" seed="0" index="0" tabchangeduration="200" horizon="false" opmin="0">

<!-- elective, seekbarh="int" : The parameter to set the height of SeekBar. default value is 3. -->

<!-- elective, seed="float(0. 〜 1.)" : The parameter to set the condition of switching of tabs by floating decimal point. The range of parameter is 0 to 1. default value is 0.-->

<!-- elective, index="int(0 〜 panel length)" : The parameter to set the condition of switching of tabs by integral number. The range of parameter is 0 to Number of tabs. default value is 0. -->

<!-- elective, tabchangeduration="milliseconds" : The parameter to set the velocity of swiching tab. The unit is millisecond. default value is 200. -->

<!-- elective, horizon="boolean" : The parameter to set the display of tabs by truth value. default is "false". -->

<!-- elective, opmin="float(0. 〜 1.)" : The parameter to set the opacity that is not selected tabs by floating decimal point. The parameter is effective in case of above parameter is "true". The range of parameter is 0 to 1. default value is 0. -->

Event and Function

var tab = document.getElementById("ex1");
tab.addEventListener("load", function() {
    console.log("loaded");

    tab.next(); // Change next tab
    // tab.prev(); // Change prev tab

    tab.addEventListener("onfade", function(e){
        console.log("fade");
        console.log("seed is : " + e.detail.seed); //return seed value.
        console.log("fade is : " + e.detail.fade);  //return array. This is switching status of each tab.
    });
});

Example

Above example code:

<style type="text/css">
    rikaaa-tab#ex1 button {
        background-color: transparent;
        border: none;
        cursor: pointer;
        outline: none;
        padding: 0;
        appearance: none;
    }
    rikaaa-tab#ex1 .tabs {
        display: inline-block;
        width: 30px;
        height: 7px;
        background-color: white;
        margin-right: 10px;
        vertical-align: bottom;
        transition: opacity, width 200ms ease-in-out;
    }
    rikaaa-tab#ex1 .tabs.select {
        opacity: 0.5;
        width: 10px;
    }
    rikaaa-tab#ex1 .barwp {
        padding: 10px 0;
        cursor: pointer;
        font-size: 0;
    }
    rikaaa-tab#ex1 .barwp .barinner .handle {
        width: 35px;
        height: 100%;
        display: inline-block;
        background-color: white;
    }
    rikaaa-tab#ex1 .barwp .barinner {
        background: repeating-linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4), rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4) 2px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 5px);
    }
    rikaaa-tab#ex1 .barwp .barinner * {
        pointer-events: none;
    }
    rikaaa-tab#ex1 .barwp .barinner .bar {
        text-align: right;
        background: repeating-linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff, #ffffff 2px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 5px);
    }
    rikaaa-tab#ex1 .panel h4 {
        margin-bottom: 10px;
        font-weight: bold;
        background-color: white;
        color: black;
        line-height: 2rem;
    }
    rikaaa-tab#ex1 .panel h4,
    rikaaa-tab#ex1 .panel p {
        padding-left: 2%;
    }
    rikaaa-tab#ex1 .panel figure,
    rikaaa-tab#ex1 .panel img {
        vertical-align: bottom;
        margin: 0;
        width: 100%;
    }
    rikaaa-tab#ex1 .panel figcaption {
        margin-top: 2px;
    }
</style>
<rikaaa-tab id="ex1" seekbarh="10"><button slot="tab"></button><button slot="tab"></button><button slot="tab"></button>
    <section class="barwp" slot="bar">
        <div class="barinner">
            <div class="bar">
                <div class="handle"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>
    <section class="panel">
        <figure><img src="images/foi_walk00.jpg" />
            <figcaption>
                <h4>image00</h4>
                <p>The Newt...</p>
                <p>The height of the element </p>
            </figcaption>
        </figure>
    </section>
    <section class="panel">
        <figure><img src="images/foi_walk01.jpg" />
            <figcaption>
                <h4>image01</h4>
                <p>The Newt is...</p>
                <p>The height of the element </p>
                <p>is automatically deformed</p>
            </figcaption>
        </figure>
    </section>
    <section class="panel">
        <figure><img src="images/foi_walk02.jpg" />
            <figcaption>
                <h4>image02</h4>
                <p>The Newt is walking!!</p>
                <p>The height of the element </p>
                <p>is automatically deformed</p>
                <p>while linear complementing.</p>
            </figcaption>
        </figure>
    </section>
</rikaaa-tab>
